name: Kinesis Bridged KDA (Ethereum)
description: kb-KDA is a bridged version of KDA on Ethereum, enabling users to manage and trade KDA as an ERC-20 token on the Ethereum blockchain. The Kinesis Bridge utilizes infrastructure powered by Hyperlane (https://kinesisbridge.xyz/). This wrapped asset provides seamless cross-chain functionality, allowing KDA holders to access Ethereum's DeFi ecosystem while maintaining exposure to Kadena's native token through secure bridging technology. KDA is the native token on the Kadena blockchain.
